body.p:
Louisville Ky May 17th 1864
Hon. T. E Bramlette
Frankfort
Ky
Dear Sir
I herewith send you the petition of John Schroeder who I know to be an innocent boy and feel some interest in. I therefore beg you not to permit his head to be shaved until you look into his case.

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Pardon granted
Tho E Bramlette
John Scroder
18th May 64
